hosts_name_not_empty.name: hosts_name_not_empty
hosts_name_not_empty.value: (name IS NOT NULL) AND (TRIM(BOTH FROM name) <> ''::text)

Users can view messages they sent or rec.name: Users can view messages they sent or received

Users can insert their own messages.name: Users can insert their own messages

Users can update messages they received.name: Users can update messages they received to mark as read

public.collection_stats.name: collection_stats
public.collection_stats.definition: SELECT host_name, count(*) AS total_collections, sum(individual_sandwiches) AS total_individual, sum( CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length(group_collections) > 0 THEN ( SELECT sum((elem.value ->> 'count'::text)::integer) AS sum FROM jsonb_array_elements(collections.group_collections) elem(value) WHERE (elem.value ->> 'count'::text) IS NOT NULL) ELSE 0::bigint END) AS total_group, min(collection_date) AS first_collection, max(collection_date) AS latest_collection, sum(individual_sandwiches)::numeric + sum( CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length(group_collections) > 0 THEN ( SELECT sum((elem.value ->> 'count'::text)::integer) AS sum FROM jsonb_array_elements(collections.group_collections) elem(value) WHERE (elem.value ->> 'count'::text) IS NOT NULL) ELSE 0::bigint END) AS total_sandwiches FROM collections GROUP BY host_name ORDER BY (sum(individual_sandwiches)::numeric + sum( CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length(group_collections) > 0 THEN ( SELECT sum((elem.value ->> 'count'::text)::integer) AS sum FROM jsonb_array_elements(collections.group_collections) elem(value) WHERE (elem.value ->> 'count'::text) IS NOT NULL) ELSE 0::bigint END)) DESC
